title: How did you prepare for your ANTHE exam of class 10? - Quora

response.answer_text: See, I am from deeksha where we get into through a test called Dsat, so basically all the coaching classes held there own enternance test, I suggest you to be very good in 10th math portions (SPEED AND ACCURACY) and science mainly from carbon and compounds, acid,bases,salts in physics practise all the problems in ncert. In Dsat they usually teach us a chapter like complex numbers which was thought for me, and they test us on the same day after giving a break of 1 hour.
